Unwind with Great Value at Red Roof PLUS+ Mt Pleasant – Patriots Point

Red Roof PLUS+ Mt Pleasant – Patriots Point combines upgraded comfort with coastal charm just minutes from downtown Charleston. Conveniently located near the Cooper River Bridge, our Upscale Economy® hotel offers easy access to Patriots Point, historic landmarks, and waterfront attractions.

Our PLUS+ property redefines affordable travel with modern upgrades and consistent service. It’s everything you love about Red Roof Inn, PLUS+ more, offering a refreshed stay designed for comfort and convenience.

Our hotel is 100% smoke free. Guests can expect a relaxing stay with the essentials they need, including free Verified Wi-Fi, a free expanded cable package featuring HBO, and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool (open 10 AM–7 PM daily, ask the front desk for details). Additional amenities include paid guest laundry and complimentary coffee in the lobby. We are proud to be a pet-friendly hotel, so your four-legged companion is always welcome.

Red Roof PLUS+ Mt Pleasant – Patriots Point places you near Charleston’s top attractions, including Rainbow Row, the South Carolina Aquarium, and Waterfront Park. Guests can also explore Patriots Point Naval & Maritime Museum, White Point Garden, and the historic streets, dining, and galleries of downtown Charleston, just across the bridge.
Please note, we are currently offering limited cleaning service for stayover guests. Please see the front desk upon arrival for details. More
